snippet: To really honor Senator Lautenberg, Congress should advance his gun safety proposal.
abstract: Editorial notes Sen Frank Lautenberg, during his final months in Senate; was intent on reintroducing gun safety proposal that would close loophole in law that allows people on government's terrorist watch list to buy guns and explosives; urges lawmakers to pass bill in his memory.
lead_paragraph: To really honor Senator Lautenberg, Congress should advance his gun safety proposal.

headline.seo: In Memory of Lautenberg, Close the Terror Gap
headline.main: In Memoriam, Close the Terror Gap
headline.print_headline: In Memoriam, Close the Terror Gap
